statements: DELETE FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc';
DELETE FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE id = 1 AND company_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE risk_score > 0.8 AND trading_strategy = 'Long-term';
DELETE FROM TradingStrategies WHERE strategy_name = 'MACD' AND created_on < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE id = 1 AND risk_score > 0.5;
DELETE FROM TradingStrategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Moving Average' AND created_on < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TradeHistory WHERE asset_id = 10 AND quantity > 100;
